'''Silhouette Event''' is a Web [[Event]] in [[Version 2.2]].

==Event Duration==
* November 14, 2021 - November 18, 2021

==Results==
* The winners of each round will be announced in the comments section the following day

==Event Rewards==
* Primogems Ã—100 (300 winners)

==Eligibility==
The official account will post one picture every day. Based on
the silhouette in the image, Travelers will have to answer the
name, area of origin, and element of the character in the
comments section.

==Event Rules==
* There are a total of 300 winners across all platforms. There is no amount of prizes set aside for each platform and region. This event will be held for 5 rounds over 5 days. The winners of each round will be announced in the comments section the next day. Please be sure to check the comments section.
* Only one prize can be won per UID. Winners must provide their information within a specific period in accordance with the official information. Winners who miss the deadline will be deemed to have forfeited their prize.
* Event rewards will be sent to Travelers via in-game mail within 15 business days after the event. Thank you for your patience while we get your rewards to you.
